title: After the Big Man’s Departure, the Debris of His Destruction Lies Everywhere
selftext: The author describes the charismatic leader’s government as not very different from a kingdom and his blistering critique of the new avatar of the republic sums up the present moment perfectly: regular raids,; a servile media; a ruler speaking of himself in the third person, and other bad news.
